abstract_summ: Hence Bhramari by enhancing the expression of Nitric Oxide and increased Carbon dioxide by extended exhalation and alkaline pH prevents coagulopathies and morbidity due to Covid-19.Abstract Background and aims The severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2 / COVID-19) pandemic is a worldwide emergency.Although most infections are uncomplicated, 5–10% of cases develop pneumonia, which can lead to hospitalization, respiratory failure and multiorgan failure.In all case reports and case series, the mothers' infection occurred in the third trimester of pregnancy, there were no maternal deaths, and most neonates had a favorable clinical course.The optimal methods to prevent, manage, and treat diarrhea in COVID-19 infected patients are subjects of intensive research.Given the characteristic pulmonary cytokine storm underlying the pathogenic mechanism of severe COVID-19 pneumonia and acute respiratory distress, antiinflammatory agents are being investigated.
title_summ: How Might They Be Prevented?Epidemiologie und Kontrollmaßnahmen bei COVID-19Is SARS-CoV-2 Vertically Transmitted?Are Quaternary Ammonium Compounds, the Workhorse Disinfectants, Effective against Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome-Coronavirus-2?COVID-19 Comes 40 Years After AIDS - Any Lesson?Modified Bhramari Pranayama in Covid 19 InfectionDiarrhea during COVID-19 infection: pathogenesis, epidemiology, prevention and managementEpidemiologie von SARS-CoV-2-Infektion und COVID-19COVID-19 and Other Pandemics:
title_abstract_phrases: In conclusion, to date, no convincing evidence has been found for vertical transmission of SARS-CoV-2.Are Quaternary Ammonium Compounds, the Workhorse Disinfectants, Effective against Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome-Coronavirus-2?A novel virus named Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome-Coronavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2) emerged from Wuhan, China in late 2019.Hence Bhramari by enhancing the expression of Nitric Oxide and increased Carbon dioxide by extended exhalation and alkaline pH prevents coagulopathies and morbidity due to Covid-19.Diarrhea during COVID-19 infection: pathogenesis, epidemiology, prevention and managementAbstract Background and aims The severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2 / COVID-19) pandemic is a worldwide emergency.Although most infections are uncomplicated, 5–10% of cases develop pneumonia, which can lead to hospitalization, respiratory failure and multiorgan failure.Epidemiologie und Kontrollmaßnahmen bei COVID-19The Coronavirus Disease Pandemic 2019 (COVID-19), caused by the Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome-related Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), started in December 2019 in China.Given the characteristic pulmonary cytokine storm underlying the pathogenic mechanism of severe COVID-19 pneumonia and acute respiratory distress, antiinflammatory agents are being investigated.
